avSummary: see 879, look 104, behold 83, shew 68, appear 66, consider 22, seer 12, spy 6, respect 5, perceive 5, provide 4, regard 4, enjoy 4, lo 3, foreseeth 2, heed 2, misc 74
definition:
1) to see, look at, inspect, perceive, consider
    1a) (Qal)
        1a1) to see
        1a2) to see, perceive
        1a3) to see, have vision
        1a4) to look at, see, regard, look after, see after, learn
             about, observe, watch, look upon, look out, find out
        1a5) to see, observe, consider, look at, give attention to,
             discern, distinguish
        1a6) to look at, gaze at
    1b) (Niphal)
        1b1) to appear, present oneself
        1b2) to be seen
        1b3) to be visible
    1c) (Pual) to be seen
    1d) (Hiphil)
        1d1) to cause to see, show
        1d2) to cause to look intently at, behold, cause to gaze at
    1e) (Hophal)
        1e1) to be caused to see, be shown
        1e2) to be exhibited to
    1f) (Hithpael) to look at each other, face
